description: Typical Australian residential brick veneer house build sets with NRM-structured scope items
source: Based on Australian construction standards 2025, NRM Level 2 hierarchy, and industry-standard heuristics

build_sets.name: 2-Bedroom Brick Veneer House
build_sets.description: Single storey, 100m² GFA, brick veneer construction, steel roof, strip footings

scope_items.description: Strip footing excavation, 450mm wide × 300mm deep
scope_items.derivation: Perimeter 48m × 1.15 (internal bearings) = 55m (no waste - removed from site)

scope_items.description: Concrete strip footings, 450mm wide × 300mm deep, N20/10 mix
Concrete slab on ground, 100mm thick, F62 mesh reinforcement
Termite treatment, chemical barrier to perimeter and slab
Underslab plumbing rough-in, drainage and water supply
Timber wall framing, 90×45mm studs at 450mm centres, treated pine
Brick veneer external walls, 110mm clay face brick, rendered and painted
Wall ties, galvanised, for brick veneer to timber frame
Timber roof trusses, pitched at 22.5°, span up to 6m
Metal roofing sheets, Colorbond, 0.42mm BMT, including flashings
Fascia and guttering, Colorbond, quad gutter 150mm
Downpipes, Colorbond, 90mm diameter
Aluminium sliding windows, powder-coated, standard residential
External door, solid core, 2040×820mm, with hardware
Sliding door to courtyard, 2100×1800mm, aluminium frame
Internal wall framing, 90×45mm studs at 450mm centres, treated pine
Internal hollow core door, 2040×820mm, painted finish, with hardware
scope_items.derivation: GFA 100m² ÷ 14m² per door = 7 doors (2 bed + 1 bath + living + laundry + garage + storage)

scope_items.description: Plasterboard walls, 10mm, taped and stopped, ready for painting
Wall painting, 3-coat system (sealer, undercoat, topcoat), acrylic
Wall tiles, 300×600mm ceramic, wet areas (bathroom/laundry)
Floor tiles, 300×300mm ceramic, wet areas (bathroom/kitchen/laundry)
Timber laminate flooring, AC4 rated, living/bedroom areas
Skirting boards, 90mm MDF, painted finish
Plasterboard ceilings, 10mm, taped and stopped
Ceiling painting, 3-coat system, acrylic
Kitchen cabinetry, standard modular, melamine finish, includes benchtop
Bathroom vanity, 900mm width, includes basin and mixer
Built-in robes, melamine finish, includes hanging rail and shelf
Shower screen, semi-frameless, 900×900mm
Double GPO (power point) supply and installation
Light point, standard ceiling rose, includes switch
Switchboard, single phase, 12-way consumer unit, RCD protected
Smoke detector, photoelectric, mains-powered with battery backup
Toilet suite, close-coupled, wall-faced, soft-close seat
Bath, acrylic, 1700mm, includes waste and overflow
Kitchen sink, stainless steel, single bowl, includes mixer tap
Laundry tub, 45L, includes cabinet and mixer tap
Hot water system, electric storage, 125L
scope_items.derivation: 1 hot water system per dwelling (125L suitable for 2-bed)

scope_items.description: Split system air conditioner, 5kW cooling capacity, wall-mounted
scope_items.derivation: 1 AC unit for main living area (5kW suitable for 100m²)

scope_items.description: Concrete driveway, 100mm thick, single garage width
Concrete paths, 75mm thick, around perimeter
Colorbond fencing, 1.8m high, standard residential
Pedestrian gate, Colorbond, 900mm wide
Landscaping allowance, turf and garden beds

standards_references: RICS NRM 2 - Detailed Measurement for Building Works
notes: All quantities are GROSS (waste-inclusive) following Australian industry standards
Waste factors applied per material type as per architect-v2.ts heuristics
NRM Level 2 codes align with migration 20251225000000
Trade hints map to existing composite library categories
Specifications suitable for Australian suburban greenfield sites
Brick veneer: 110mm face brick + 40mm cavity + 90mm timber frame + 10mm plasterboard
Electrical calculations based on residential room-type multipliers
Plumbing fixtures scaled by bathroom count (2bed=1, 3bed=2, 4bed=2.5 baths)
